text: ProSight Specialty Insurance Group, Inc. is a publicly listed specialty insurance company based in Morristown, New Jersey with offices in London; Glendale, California; and New York City.https://www.bloomberg.com/research/stocks/private/snapshot.asp?privcapId=109424937 ProSight Specialty Insurance is backed financially by affiliates of Goldman Sachs Capital Partners and TPG Capital. As a part of their commercial media and entertainment services, ProSight was reported as insuring the highest- grossing concert of 2012. In October 2017, Pro Sight was downgraded from A to A- Financial Rating. ==Company history== In 2009, Joseph Beneducci founded ProSight Specialty Insurance Holdings, Inc. The name changed to ProSight Specialty Insurance Group, Inc. in November 2010. Prior to founding ProSight, Beneducci was the CEO at Fireman's Fund Insurance Company.http://www.northjersey.com/news/business/start-up-prosight-specialty- insurance-has-sights-on-growth-1.1141366?page=all from January 2, 2007 to June 11, 2007.https://www.bloomberg.com/research/stocks/private/person.asp?personId=10021968&privcapId;=109424937 The specialty property and casualty insurance startup expanded quickly, and in 2010 it opened its Santa Rosa office location.http://www.northbaybusinessjournal.com/24534/from-linens-to- insurance-companies-expand/ The company now has locations in Morristown, New Jersey; London; Glendale, California; and New York City. In 2014, ProSight Specialty was featured on The 2014 Inc. 5000 list of the fastest-growing private American companies, ranking 3,204 with a $443.5 M revenue in 2013.http://www.inc.com/profile/prosight-specialty-insurance-group Prosight went public in July 2019 and is traded as PROS on the New York Stock Exchange NYSE. == Products & Services == In 2014, ProSight invested heavily in the use of in-cab camera technology as a part of their new insurance package for transportation customers.http://www.truckinginfo.com/news/story/2014/06/prosight-insurance- smartdrive-form-risk-management-alliance.aspx These cameras monitor and record events such as crashes, hard braking, and lane departures to improve safety and reduce the corresponding accident claims.http://www.ttnews.com/articles/basetemplate.aspx?storyid=35279 In May 2014, the firm announced an expansion of their services into the energy market with insurance programs focused on propane and fuel dealers, oil and gas contractors, and solar energy contractors.http://www.insurancejournal.com/news/national/2014/05/21/329776.htm == International == In addition to its U.S. headquarters and offices, the company also has an international presence with its ProSight Specialty Underwriters Ltd. London office, which focuses on underwriting services and insurance.http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150226006905/en/ProSight- Specialty-Insurance-Receives-Final-Authorisation-Launch#.VRHg3zTF8fg == References == Category:American companies established in 2009 Category:Financial services companies established in 2009 Category:Insurance companies of the United States Category:Companies based in New Jersey Category:2009 establishments in New Jersey Category:Companies listed on the New York Stock Exchange
title: ProSight Specialty Insurance
